briefdescription.para: Initialize the fields of a Discord Adapter handle.

parameterdescription.para: a pointer to the allocated handle
optional pointer to a pre-initialized logconf
the bot token
a pointer to the adapter handle

memberdef.argsstring: (struct discord_adapter *adapter, struct ua_resp_handle *resp_handle, struct sized_buffer *req_body, enum http_method http_method, char endpoint[],...)
memberdef.name: discord_adapter_run

briefdescription.para: Start a HTTP Request to Discord.

parameterdescription.para: the handle initialized with discord_adapter_init()
the callbacks that will be triggered should the request fail or succeed
the body sent for methods that require (ex: POST), leave as NULL if unecessary
the method in opcode format of the request being sent
the format endpoint that be appended to base_url when performing a request, same behavior as printf()

simplesect.para: a code for checking on how the transfer went ORCA_OK means the transfer was succesful

parameterdescription.para: the client adapter containinig every bucket found

detaileddescription.para:
Check if connections from a bucket hit its threshold, and lock every connection associated with the bucket until cooldown time elapses
bucket
check if a cooldown is necessary

Check if bucket associated with route has already been discovered
adapter
the handle created with discord_adapter_init()
route
that will be checked for a bucket match
bucket associated with route or NULL if no match found

memberdef.argsstring: (struct discord_adapter *adapter, struct discord_bucket *bucket, const char route[], struct ua_info *info)
memberdef.name: discord_bucket_build

briefdescription.para: Update the bucket with response header data.

parameterdescription.para: the handle created with discord_adapter_init()
NULL when bucket is first discovered
the route associated with the bucket
information struct regarding the current transfer

simplesect.para: If the bucket was just discovered it will be created here.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the fields of Discord Gateway handle.

parameterdescription.para: a pointer to the allocated handle
optional pointer to a initialized logconf
the bot token
a pointer to the gateway handle

briefdescription.para: Start a Discord connection over WebSockets.

parameterdescription.para: the handle initialized with discord_gateway_init()

briefdescription.para: Gracefully exits a ongoing Discord connection over WebSockets.

parameterdescription.para: the handle initialized with discord_gateway_init()

briefdescription.para: Gracefully reconnect a ongoing Discord connection over WebSockets.

parameterdescription.para: the handle initialized with discord_gateway_init()
true to attempt to resume to previous session, false restart a fresh session

briefdescription.para: File containing internal functions and datatypes.
